title: 4 Win Ip Boost
body:
Hey im just wondering if anyone can tell me how ive gotten a 4 Win Ip boost on my account, i skimmed over it when it came up a a gift but read no name, it just said Congratulations. i haven't had any of my Facebook friends join league, and it hasnt been gifted to me, is it some player behavior reward? i googled it, but it comes up with ip boost when your verify your email address which i have already had the boost from that

not really important just curious

replies.body:
Maybe the system glitched and just because one of your Facebook friends was online (who also had a League account) when the patch landed it thought that you gained that friend using the refer a friend system even though that's not what you did and it gave you the reward anyway?

If you're really curious about what happened, I suggest you [lodge a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and inquire about it. You might run the risk of them removing the bonus IP from your account, however.
Can't be a glitch, I just got that too. Wondering what it is for, maybe a reward for no chat restriction like half a year ago?

>maybe a reward for no chat restriction like half a year ago?

I won't deny it, but getting it this incredibly late is highly improbable. Unless you haven't played on that account for *ages*. Also, there was the IP boost reward for participating in the OCE region event, the one with that statue. It's possible you participated without knowing (you just had to play a certain champion in a game and win, no notification) and stopped playing before you got the reward.

Also you aren't using the same account you used to create this discussion.
